comments.body:
Looks like this is missing the property `originalError: Error` which was added in this commit: https://github.com/gajus/slonik/commit/dd3af0a920118bfa393a025e15e294536a938ed1#diff-5c8b199a98cb05fcfa67ad0a331c165b

Also, there seem to be some error types missing here, namely BackendTerminatedError, ConnectionError, InvalidInputError, QueryCancelledError and UnexpectedStateError - those should probably be added too to get these types in sync with the current version of slonik.
